newsitem.title: UK: Bangladesh tenders to buy cargo white sugar - trade.
newsitem.headline: Bangladesh tenders to buy cargo white sugar - trade.

text.p: Bangladesh tendered to buy a 12,500-tonne cargo of white sugar with offers to be submitted on March 1, London traders said on Thursday.
The specified shipment period was March 11/April 11, they said.
Last July, Bangladesh's state-owned Sugar and Food Industries Corporation bought 12,500 tonnes of white sugar at $371 per tonne c & f for August shipment.
